name: Shadow Disaster
description:
In 2030, a disaster ocurred in the little city of Agio , a great part of the population died because of a disease which transform people on zombies, the only survivor live in a little safe part of the city.  You were infect by the disease but you're the only one who survived with a part of humanity. You have the power to change the things,

Will you save the population or destroy it completely ?

Controls : 

Press Z or W to move forward

Press S to move backward

Press Q or A to move left

Press D to move right

Press SpaceBar to jump or cancel projection

Press Right Click to project yourself to an enemy or a place

Press Left Click to attack an enemy

Press Right Shift to Teleport to the targeted place

Press Escape to quit the game

Press E to reset the scene
